Description: Team registration opens for the 2025‑26 UNEARTHED season; early bird for FLL Explore.
Official release of the 2025‑26 FIRST LEGO League Explore season; challenge set and resources available.
Suggested deadline for team registration and event sign‑ups (varies by region).
Begin weekly team meetings to explore the theme, build models, and prepare for the festival.
Local and virtual festival submission window opens; confirm your local affiliate’s deadline.
Final opportunities to present at a local or virtual festival before the season concludes.
